name: @ash@acegiak.net
note: Gameplay & Narrative Designer, Writer, Occasional Streamer, Anarchoqueer, and Goblin Queen.

content.html: Mastodon had grown so rich, he wanted to retire. He took me to his cabin and he told me his secret. 'I am not #JohnMastodon,' he said. 'My name is Ryan; I inherited the network from the previous John Mastodon, just as you will inherit it from me. The man I inherited it from is not the real John Mastodon either. His name was Cummerbund. The real Mastodon has been retired 15 years and living like a king in Patagonia.
content.value: Mastodon had grown so rich, he wanted to retire. He took me to his cabin and he told me his secret. 'I am not #JohnMastodon,' he said. 'My name is Ryan; I inherited the network from the previous John Mastodon, just as you will inherit it from me. The man I inherited it from is not the real John Mastodon either. His name was Cummerbund. The real Mastodon has been retired 15 years and living like a king in Patagonia.

photo.alt: Westly, not John Mastodon. A still from The Princess Bride.

content.html: Fell asleep in a sunbeam and woke up to see the Twitter's latest insanity. What a lovely day.

content.html: In case you missed it yesterday (there was a "game awardz" thing) Emerald Woods, the free no-combat, #farming, exploration and creature collecting #roguelike, now has Graphics! content.html: Ok but wouldn't it be more DnD to break "race/species" into physical features and culture as separate choices? Hell subraces get within an inch of this anyway before tripping straight onto its whole face.

content.html:
Today, #TurnBasedFest starts on Steam, so I updated our store page with a couple of screenshots, fresh out of unity!

Player characters now have proper attack animations (think Darkest Dungeon), which makes such a difference and was long overdue!

https://bit.ly/3gdWnrB

#gamedev #indiedev #roguelike #turnbased #madewithunity
